nodes.text: Octuptarras were eight eyed, gasbag-headed vine walkers native to the planet Skako that were the namesakes of the octuptarra tri-droid, a model of droid walker manufactured by the Techno Union.

Octuptarras were first mentioned in the original Databank's entry for the octuptarra droid. They became canon when they were mentioned in Star Wars Character Encyclopedia: Updated and Expanded, an updated edition of the Star Wars Character Encyclopedia reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo that was released on April 5, 2016.
